pages.title: Description
pages.text: The cold season has led to a massive die-off of plants that are not hardy and the only source of food is broken. $(br2) We have to find ways to feed the plants.

pages.title: Greenhouse Construction
pages.text: The $(6) Greenhouse $() allows crops to grow properly in cold weather. $(br2) You just need to build a tunnel-like shape using $(6) Greenhouse Glass $(). $(br2)The height between the glass and the crop must not exceed $(c)6 $() blocks, otherwise the greenhouse will not work.
